title: How to Create Mugs in Dwarf Fortress

steps.title: Go to Craftdwarf's Workshop.
steps.content: Go to Craftdwarf's Workshop. Build this workshop in your fortress to make items needed for trade! [1] X Research source

steps.title: Click Add new task.
steps.content: Click Add new task . It's an option you'll see after opening Craftdwarf's workshop.

steps.title: Select the mug task and assign a dwarf.
steps.content: Select the mug task and assign a dwarf. Now that it's a task, you need to assign a dwarf to make it! Use the on-screen prompt to have a dwarf complete the task. Once your worker is done creating the mug, it'll automatically appear in your fortress inventory.
